name: Flannery Flames (jam version)
description:
A roguelike action platformer made for the Boss Rush Jam 2023. After each boss battle, you are rewarded powerups to choose from. Also, at the beginning of the run, you are "blessed" with two powerups.

Controls:

These controls are default. But they can be changed in the Settings (keybinding). Also, there is support for gamepad (without a HUD at the moment).

MOVEArrow KeysATTACK
SJUMPADASHDSPIN ATTACK (AIR JUMP)ASPECIAL ATTACKUp + S Video:

It's possible to scale the game window in the Settings, by choosing video options.
